faq.question: Will I miss important information?
faq.answer: No. Our AI is designed to extract all key information, main arguments, important data, and conclusions. Nothing critical gets left out.

faq.question: How detailed are the summaries?
faq.answer: Summaries are comprehensive yet concise - typically 1-2 pages covering all major points. You can adjust detail level or ask for more specific information.

faq.question: Can I use summaries for work presentations?
faq.answer: Absolutely! Many users create presentations and reports based on our summaries. The information is accurate and complete.

faq.question: What if I need to reference the original?
faq.answer: Every summary includes page references so you can quickly find the original content if needed.

faq.question: Does it work with scanned PDFs?
faq.answer: Yes! Our OCR technology extracts text from scanned documents and images, then summarizes them.

faq.question: How much does it cost?
faq.answer: Free plan: 5 summaries/month. Starter ($9/mo): 50 summaries. Pro ($19/mo): 200 summaries. See all plans.
